about_the_game:
This demo is released for everyone to play for FREE. The demo version aims to demonstrate the game's gameplay and core mechanic, which contains one-round content. this game was originally designed as a mobile game, so the console is using windows 16:9 resolution. And mobile version of the full version of School Booster will release in the soonish future.

* School Booster was initially designed as an idle game that came with one objective, which is to play around with your attributes numbers and think of a strategy to get as higher numbers as possible. Players are required only use a mouse cursor to play the game.

* In the School Booster, you will play the role of being a parent raising your girl to an adult (18). her grow-up journey will come from heaven, baby, kid, teenager, these four sages. And each stage has slightly different playing mechanics. Tutorials are included at the start of each level to assist in understanding a few mechanics at each stage.

* some variabilities will be added in the full version, such as customized names, various future results, steam achievements, etc.

legal_notice: it is developed by an indie game studio, all assets are made originally or loyalty free. free play to everyone
name: School Booster Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP 32-bit
  • Processor: intel Pentium 4 2.0GHz / AMD Athlon XP 2000+
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 4200 or NVIDIA GeForce 210
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
